verses.name: Mark 12:1
verses.text: And he began to speak unto them by parables. A certain man planted a vineyard, and set an hedge about it, and digged a place for the winefat, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country.

verses.name: Mark 12:2
verses.text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.

verses.name: Mark 12:3
verses.text: And they caught him, and beat him, and sent him away empty.
